scripts.dev:frontend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm --workspace frontend run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm --workspace backend run dev
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm  run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:frontend: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm --workspace frontend run build
scripts.build:backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm --workspace backend run build
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
